marklogic.body: Rick Santorum cares as much about Trayvon as Sharpton, Jesse, and the Black Panther thugs. For Santorum, it's an opportunity to Gain some libtard votes. For the civil rights "leaders", it's an opportunity to pass some more laws, get some shake-down money, use that money for God knows what, and patiently wait for another pawn to continue this process. Where is the Bleeding heart for the black youths who regularly get murdered on the streets of Detroit? We don't know if Zimmerman is guilty and I wish the irresponsible media would stop spinning this story. But I tell you one thing, if it comes out that Zimmerman was innocent, then Sharpton and Jesse would truly be heartbroken.
